actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide that the Consumer Price Index prepared by the Bureau of Labor Statistics shall give appropriate weight to Federal, State, and local taxes.

summary.text: Provides that the Consumer Price Index prepared by the Bureau of Labor Statistics shall give appropriate weight to Federal, State, and local taxes.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Consumer Price Index prepared by the Bureau of Labor Statistics shall give appropriate weight to Federal, State, and local taxes.
